name: Super Mummy Blitz
description:
You Died, thats how it is and you have accepted it for a while now.
But those anoying Dolly's think you still want to be alive, so they come after you with their Healtbags to resurect you.
Ofcourse you now need to kill them, because.. they are dolly''s and they wont stop untill they have you all fixed up and better again.
You could make a run for it, and activate some traps or stand still and make your heart pound once again from the massive hug horde that will.. Yes it will come over you!!
But thats not you right! You want to stay Dead.

Controls
Keyboard
Left      A
Right    D
Jump    Space
Dash    W
Restart R
Mute  M

Gamepad
Left      Thumbstick
Right    Thumbstick
Jump    A
Dash    B
Restart Back
Mute  X

This game was made for a gamejam https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-61
I had loads of fun creating it within the 72 hours time limit.
IF you like it give a shoutout, And if it sucks, do the same :-)
Also check out my skateboarding game on twitch.
https://www.twitch.tv/wormjuicedev
Im working almost daily on it while streaming.
See you!

Wormjuice.
